overview:
Chief Marketing Officer at Oddsfutures.com, the world’s first dedicated sports odds trading exchange.

Bertrand, a French national, is an accomplished marketer with 17 years international marketing and sales management experience in France, Spain, Ireland, Latin America and Australia. Bertrand also earned his MBA from Macquarie Graduate School of Management (Sydney) in 2009, and has a Diploma in Digital Marketing.

Bertrand has a proven track record of driving businesses with an emphasis on growth and profitability, and in establishing and managing executive level client and channel relationships. He has also developed an expertise in defining, implementing and monitoring ROI driven on and off-line marketing strategies, and is a firm believer in the power of new technologies as efficient networking and communication platforms. Bertrand is responsible for managing all online marketing, both online and offline including affiliate marketing platforms. Bertrand is also an unconditional supporter of (French) rugby and Stade Toulousain.
